# Introduction
Developed in 2007 with the object of storage data from large scale 
studies including the Human Micorbiome Project as well the 1000 
GenomesProject, the Sequencing Read Archive (SRA) is a public 
repository developed as an initiative from the National Center for 
Biotechnology Information (NCBI), the European Bioinformatics 
Institute (EBI), and the DNA Data Bank of Japan (DDBJ).

Developed in 2007 to allocate raw sequencing data from biological 
studies, processed by different platforms as Roche-454 Life Sciences, 
Illumina Solexa and Applied Biosystems SOLiD.
